text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse There is nothing here for you to claim credit for. And for you to attempt to do so shows the kind of person you are:

An attention-seeking egomaniac.

But, we already knew that, didn't we?

https://t.co/K3YedMfuAg
